mapper.insert: insert into bookinfo(bookNumber, bookTitle, bookComent, bookWrite, bookPub, bookDate, bookMajorCategory, bookSubCategory, bookCount) values ((select nvl(max(bookNumber), 0)+1 from bookinfo), #{bookTitle}, #{bookComent}, #{bookWrite}, #{bookPub}, #{bookDate}, #{bookMajorCategory}, #{bookSubCategory}, #{bookCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM bookinfo ORDER BY bookBorrowCount DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM bookinfo WHERE 1=1
AND bookTitle LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND bookWrite LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND bookIsbn LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND bookPub LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND bookMajorCategory = #{majorCategory}
AND bookSubCategory = #{subCategory}
ORDER BY bookTitle ASC
select bookNumber, bookIsbn, bookTitle, bookComent, bookWrite, bookPub, bookDate, bookMajorCategory, bookSubCategory, bookCount, bookBorrowCount from bookinfo where bookNumber=#{bookNumber}
